description: Multi-stage pipeline: Discover → Enrich → Generate → Export

google-maps-scraper-outscraper.purpose: Scrape businesses from Google Maps using Outscraper API
google-maps-scraper-outscraper.output: Array of businesses with basic info (name, address, phone, website, reviews)
google-maps-scraper-outscraper.whenToUse: Initial business discovery for a location/postcode

website-scraper.purpose: Extract company registration, owner names, and emails (ALL IN ONE PASS)
website-scraper.output: { ownerNames (with hasEmailMatch, matchedEmail), emails, registrationNumber, registeredAddress }
website-scraper.whenToUse: After Google Maps scraping, for each business with a website
website-scraper.keyBehavior: Two-phase: (1) Extract all emails first, (2) Extract names and validate against emails with email claiming

keyFunctions.scrapeWebsite: Main entry point, returns all website data
keyFunctions.extractOwnerNames: Extract names and validate against emails
keyFunctions.findMatchingEmail: Match name to email with email claiming logic

website-email-extractor.whenToUse: DEPRECATED - website-scraper now handles email extraction

icypeas-finder.output: Verified business emails with confidence scores

social-media-email-extractor.purpose: DEPRECATED - Extract emails from social media

reoon-verifier.purpose: Verify email deliverability using Reoon API
reoon-verifier.whenToUse: Before exporting leads to Lemlist to avoid bounces

email-merge-variables.purpose: Generate ALL merge variables for email personalization
email-merge-variables.whenToUse: After enrichment, before export to Lemlist

keyFunctions.getMultiOwnerNote: Handles multi-owner scenarios (capped at 5, Oxford comma)
keyFunctions.getMicroOfferPrice: Tiered pricing based on business tier
keyFunctions.getMeetingOption: In-person vs phone based on proximity

observation-signals.purpose: Compute observation signals for email hooks
observation-signals.input: Business data (reviews, website quality, social media)

gpt-email-generator.purpose: Generate custom email copy using GPT-4
gpt-email-generator.whenToUse: For fully custom emails (not using templates)

lemlist-exporter.purpose: Export leads to Lemlist email campaigns
lemlist-exporter.input: Campaign ID, lead data with merge variables
lemlist-exporter.whenToUse: Final step after enrichment + merge variable generation

logger.keyFeature: Automatically masks email addresses to avoid GDPR violations

credentials-loader.purpose: Load API credentials and track usage quotas

phase1_discovery.output: Array of businesses with basic info

phase2_dataCollection.description: Extract all data from website in a single fetch
subSteps: 2B: Extract ALL owner/staff names from website (extractOwnerNames)
2C: Validate names against emails with email claiming (findMatchingEmail)
2D: Sort names by email validation (validated first)
phase2_dataCollection.output: { ownerNames (sorted by hasEmailMatch), emails, registration data }
phase2_dataCollection.keyPoint: Email claiming ensures only one person can claim each email

phase3_intelligentEnrichment.output: Complete merge variable set with multi-owner note

phase4_export.output: Lead exported successfully or duplicate detected

personalPatterns.description: Personal email patterns tested in order of priority
personalPatterns.note: Personal emails always win over role-based emails

roleBasedPatterns.description: Role-based email patterns mapped to job titles

duplicateHandling.description: Track claimed emails in Set, only one person can claim each email
duplicateHandling.priority: Personal emails > Senior roles > Junior roles

example.note: First person to match claims the email

countingLogic.emailMatchCount: Count of UNIQUE emails matched (not people)
countingLogic.peopleWithEmails: Count of people who have email matches

multiOwnerNoteRules.template: Quick note – I'm also reaching out to {{otherOwners}} since I wasn't sure who handles this at {{companyName}}.

example.otherOwners: Zoe, Christopher, Michael, Barbara, and Nicola

afterDiscovery.description: Business object after Google Maps scraping

afterMergeVariables.description: Business object with complete merge variables

fetchingWebsiteMultipleTimes.problem: Separate calls to scrapeWebsite, extractEmailsFromWebsite, getRegistrationNumber

notValidatingNamesAgainstEmails.problem: Extracting names without email validation leads to wrong primary contact
notValidatingNamesAgainstEmails.solution: Always pass emails to extractOwnerNames() for validation

ignoringDuplicateEmails.problem: Multiple people claiming same email inflates emailMatchCount
ignoringDuplicateEmails.solution: Use email claiming with Set to track claimed emails

usingSocialMediaExtractors.problem: Violates Terms of Service, legal risk

nearbyPostcodes.description: Postcodes within 45 minutes of Poynton SK12

tierPricing.description: Tiered pricing multipliers applied to base micro-offer price
